2164.subject: SPAN
2164.course_title_long: Service Learning in the Chicano / Latino Community
2164.descrlong:
This course is part of your Spanish language learning experience, and offers you the opportunity to interact in a personal way with members of the local Latino community, thereby enriching your understanding of Hispanic cultures and the Spanish language. As a community-based learning experience, the course provides students with career-related experience working collaboratively with community agencies to address community concerns / issues. (Offered fall semester). 

[Prereq: (Junior or Senior Standing) and (SPAN 202) and (WLC Spanish Majors Only)]
